Classes
Credit Card API

The xTuple Credit Card subsystem contains the internal code for processing credit card transactions and the user interface for configuring the credit card handling. More...

Detailed Description

The xTuple Credit Card subsystem contains the internal code for processing credit card transactions and the user interface for configuring the credit card handling.
